alert.note: Alert for Daniels; Eastern Roosevelt; Sheridan; Western Roosevelt (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 3:43AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Daniels, Roosevelt, Sheridan Counties through 445 AM MDT... At 342 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Flaxville to 9 miles northwest of Poplar. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wolf Point, Plentywood, Scobey, Poplar, Culbertson, Brockton, Medicine Lake, Bainville, Froid, Westby, Flaxville, Archer, Port Of Raymond, Port Of Whitetail, Madoc, Bredette, Port Of Scobey, Redstone, Whitetail and Outlook. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
